member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageSetup.BleedBox
member.summary: Gets or sets a object that indicates the bleed box of the page. The bleed box (PDF 1.3) defines the region to which the contents of the page should be clipped when output in a production environment. This may include any extra bleed area needed to accommodate the physical limitations of cutting, folding, and trimming equipment. The actual printed page may include printing marks that fall outside the bleed box.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageSetup.ArtBox
member.summary: Gets or sets a object that indicates the art box of the page. The art box (PDF 1.3) defines the extent of the pages meaningful content (including potential white space) as intended by the pages creator.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageSetup.TrimBox
member.summary: Gets or sets a object that indicates the trim box of the page. The trim box (PDF 1.3) defines the intended dimensions of the finished page after trimming. It may be smaller than the media box, to allow for productionrelated content such as printing instructions, cut marks, or color bars.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageSetup.PageBorder
member.summary: Gets or sets a object that indicates the page border.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageSetup.PageBorderMargin
member.summary: Gets or sets a object that indicates the margin between the page border and the page edge. The default value is half of the page margin.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageSetup.PageGutter
member.summary: Gets or sets a object that indicates the page gutter.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageTransitionType
member.summary: Enumerates transition types for page transition effects when revealing the new page.

member.name: F:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageTransitionType.None
member.summary: No transition.

member.name: F:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageTransitionType.Split
member.summary: Two lines sweep across the screen.

member.name: F:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageTransitionType.Blinds
member.summary: Multiple lines,evenly spaced across the screen,synchronously sweep in the same direction.

member.name: F:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageTransitionType.Box
member.summary: A rectangular box sweeps inward from the edges of the page or outward from the center.

member.name: F:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageTransitionType.Wipe
member.summary: A single line sweeps across the screen from one edge to the other.

member.name: F:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageTransitionType.Dissolve
member.summary: The old page dissolves gradually.

member.name: F:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageTransitionType.Glitter
member.summary: Similar to Dissolve except that the effect sweeps across the page in a wide band moving from one side of the screen to the other.

member.name: F:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PageTransitionType.Replace
member.summary: The new page simply replaces the old one with no special transition effect.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf

member.name: M:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for Evaluation License.
member.remarks: It can be used in both Windows Forms applications and Web Forms applications when the license type is Evaluation License.

member.name: M:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class for Evaluation License. You can use SetLicense method to set license if you have purchased license.If you use this constructor,the component will work in direct-to-file or direct-to-stream mode. That means all paragraphs will be rendered into pdf file or stream without being saved in the document object model. Less memory will be consumed in this mode,but you can't access the paragraphs that be added into the document any more, so some of the advanced features such as combination of XML and API,hyperlink to specified paragraph,total page number in footer,etc.,is not available.
member.param: The stream to write the document.

member.name: M:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.Close
member.summary: Close the document. This method is used for direct-to-file mode only.

member.name: M:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.SetLicense(System.String)
member.summary: Obsolete. Licenses this component to use in a Windows application.

remarks.p: Use this class for licenses purchased before 2005/01/22. Aspose has upgraded to a new licensing system, please use License. for licenses purchased after that date.

member.param: The license filename with its path.

member.summary: Obsolete. Licenses this component to use in a Windows application.

remarks.p: Use this class for licenses purchased before 2005/01/22. Aspose has upgraded to a new licensing system, please use License. for licenses purchased after that date.

member.param: Where to read the license from. Please create the TextReader with UnicodeEncoding.UTF7.

member.param: The license filename with its path.
The page that requests this object.

member.summary: Obsolete. Licenses this component to use in a Web application.

remarks.p: Use this class for licenses purchased before 2005/01/22. Aspose has upgraded to a new licensing system, please use License. for licenses purchased after that date.

member.param: Where to read the license from.Please create the TextReader with UnicodeEncoding.UTF7.
The page that requests this object.

member.name: M:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.SetLicenseCOM(System.String)
member.summary: Obsolete. Licenses this component to use in a COM application.

remarks.p: Use this class for licenses purchased before 2005/01/22. Aspose has upgraded to a new licensing system, please use License. for licenses purchased after that date.

example.code: Set pdf1 = server.CreateObject("Aspose.Pdf.Pdf") pdf1.SetLicenseCOM("e:\projects\CSharp\customer\Aspose.Pdf.lic") set sec1 = server.CreateObject("Aspose.Pdf.Section") pdf1.Sections.Add(sec1) set t1 = server.CreateObject("Aspose.Pdf.Text") set s1 = server.CreateObject("Aspose.Pdf.Segment") s1.Content = "hello" t1.Segments.Add(s1) sec1.Paragraphs.Add(t1) pdf1.Save("test.Pdf")

member.param: The license filename with its path.

member.remarks: When converting Word to Pdf, some font is needed to be set to unicode in Aspose.Pdf.Generator. This method is used to set all fonts to unicode. The font subset will then be embedded.

This property needs to be assigned before the call to is made.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsSpaced
member.summary:
Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the spaces at the begin of the text and returns in the text be shown. For the following XML:
<Text> <Segment>The first line, The second line.</Segment> </Text>
If IsSpaced is false, the result will be:
The first line,The second line.
If IsSpaced is true, the result will be:
The first line, The second line.

member.summary: Gets or sets a float value that indicates the width of the heading label.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.CompressionLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets an int value that indicates the compression level. It can be between 0 (the least compression) and 9 (the most compression) and the default value is 6.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates the document open action.

member.summary: Gets or sets a string that indicates the creator of the Pdf document.

member.summary: Gets a string that indicates the producer of the Pdf document. Property is read-only, any setted value has no effect.

member.summary: Gets or sets a string that indicates key words of the Pdf document.

member.summary: Gets or sets a string that indicates the subject of the Pdf document.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.PageTransitionType
member.summary: Gets or sets a that indicates the pdf document page transition type.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.PageDuration
member.summary: Gets or sets a int value that indicates the duration in seconds for the current page. This property is used when using auto advancing in presentation mode.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.Security
member.summary: Gets or sets a object that indicates the document security information.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsImagesInXmlDeleteNeeded
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether images used in XML be deleted when the PDF document is generated.
member.remarks: This property is used when integration with Aspose.Word. When converting Word document to PDF, Aspose.Word will save images in Word document as file and add the file name into XML. If this property is set to true,Aspose.Pdf.Generator will delete these image files used in XML.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsBuffered
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether memory buffer is used when generating PDF document. The default value is true. If this property is set to false, Aspose.Pdf.Generator will write document directly to PDF file and the method can't be used.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsBookmarked
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the pdf document is bookmarked when generating PDF document. The default value is false. If this property is set to true, Aspose.Pdf.Generator will create bookmarks for all the s in the PDF if the relative property is not set.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.BookmarkLevel
member.summary: Gets or sets a int value that indicates how many levels of of the pdf document is to be bookmarked. The default value is 0, which means every heading of the PDF is to be taged as a bookmark. Only when the relative property is set as true, this property is valid. If is true and this property is set to a non-integer value levelNumber, Aspose.Pdf.Generator will create bookmarks for the corresponding s of level 1 to level levelNumber.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.TabStopPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the tab stop position. Default value is 36 points (0.5inch).

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.HtmlInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets a object that indicates the necessary info when converting HTML to PDF.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsPageNumberRestarted
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the page number is restarted in new section. Default is false.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsCoreFontUsed
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether PDF core fonts are used. Default is true. If this property is set to false, PDF core fonts will be ignored and all font will be used as TrueType font.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsXmlSchemaCheckedOnBind
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the error is ignored when unknown elements or attributes are used in xml file. Default is false.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsImageNotFoundErrorIgnored
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the "image not found" error is ignored or not.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsPageNumberForDocument
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether total page number is count for whole document. If this property is set to true, the "$P" symbol will be replaced by the total page number of the document. Otherwise "$P" will be replaced with the total page number of all sections that were not restarted ("IsPageNumberRestarted" is set to true).

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsTruetypeFontMapCached
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether truetype font map be cached on disk. Truetype font map is a font name to font file name map which is used when using unicode. If unicode is used, setting this property to true can make your application run fast. If this property is set to true and the system's fonts are changed (for example, new fonts are installed), delete the font map file (Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TruetypeFontMap.xml) and it will be generated again automatically.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.TruetypeFontMapPath
member.summary: Gets or set a string that indicates the path of the truetype font map file. This property is valid only when the "IsTruetypeFontMapCached" property is set to true.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.TruetypeFontMapStream
member.summary: Gets or set a memory stream that indicates the TrueType font map stream. This property is valid only when the "IsTruetypeFontMapCached" property is set to true. Normally you should use "TruetypeFontMapPath" instead of this property. But in some server, it is not permitted to create file on disk so you can use TrueType font map stream. You need to create the font map stream only once when you application is running.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.PageCount
member.summary: Gets a int value that indicates the pages count of the generated PDF. You can only get the value of this property when the method is called.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.Watermarks
member.summary: Gets or sets a which will be added upon each page of the PDF document.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.DocumentAttachments
member.summary: Gets or sets a which will be added upon the PDF document.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsFontNotFoundExceptionThrown
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether throw out exception when font is not found. The default value is false.In this case,if user specified font is not found,default font works.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsWatermarkOnTop
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates if the watermark is on top of the page.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsLandscape
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the page orientation is landscape. The default is false, portrait.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.Index
member.summary: Gets or sets an object.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.JavaScripts
member.summary: Gets or sets a object that indicates the JavaScripts to be added into the PDF.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.XmpMetadata
member.summary: Gets or sets a Object that indicates the XMP metadata to be added into the PDF document.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.DefaultFontName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that indicates the default font name. When font name is not set or the font is not found, this font will be used. The default value is "Times-Roman".

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsRightToLeft
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the text or heading appear in the pdf is right-to-left aligned. If it is true, all the texts and headings will be processed as right-to-left language previously. If text or heading don't contain any right-to-left lanuage character, they will be processed as usual( left-to-right). This property is used for right-to-left aligned language such as Arabic and Hebrew.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsRtlInSegmentMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the text or heading is processed in segment mode. If it is true(default),segment in text will be processed one by one. If false, all segments in text will be put together, reorder in arabic rule. We recommend set it true when rendering rtl and non-rtl mixed texts.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsWidowOrphanControlEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the Widow/Orphan control is enabled. Default is true. If it is true, Widow/Orphan control is enabled and Widows/orphans themselves are eliminated (disabled).

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.TempFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates where temporary files stored.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.IsAutoFontAdjusted
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether allow to adjust fonts automatically. Each font has a set of supported characters. Sometimes, users may assign a font to a Segment paragraph which doesn't support every character appear in the Segment. If this bool value is true, it will assign proper font to Segment paragraph according to its contents in this case. Default is false.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.Bookmarks
member.summary: Gets or sets a object that indicates the bookmarks in the PDF.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.Linearized
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates if the document needs to be linearized (optimization for web access) . The default value is false . you need to set this property before Save method is called .

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.Conformance
member.summary:
NOTE: This is beta version of PdfA.
Gets or sets a object that indicates the conformance in the PDF. The default value is PdfConformance.None . you need to set this property before Save method is called . Notice that PdfConformance.PdfA1B and PdfConformance.PdfA1A currently only support TrueType fonts and RGB color space , specify a wrong font name or a CMYK color name will cause exception.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.DirectModeItemType
member.summary: Gets or sets a DirectModeItemType value that indicates DirectModeItemsCount measure The default value is DirectModeItemType.Page

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf.DigitSubstitution
member.summary: Gets or set bool value that indicates whether to replace digits with national ones in macros'

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PdfConformance
member.summary: Enumeration for PDF/A1. PDF/A1 attempts to maximize:Device independence,Self-containment and Self-documentation . The constraints include: Audio and video content are forbidden, Javascript and executable file launches are prohibited , All fonts must be embedded and also must be legally embeddable for unlimited, universal rendering , Colorspaces specified in a device-independent manner , Encryption is disallowed, Use of standards-based metadata is mandated the files.

member.name: F:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PdfConformance.None
member.summary: No conformance

member.name: F:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PdfConformance.PdfA1B
member.summary: Part 1 of the PDF/A ISO standard [ISO 19005-1:2005] is a constrained form of Adobe PDF version 1.4 intended to be suitable for long-term preservation of page-oriented documents for which PDF is already being used in practice. Level B conformance (PDF-1b) indicates minimal compliance to ensure that the rendered visual appearance of a conforming file is preservable over the long term. Level A conformance (PDF-1a) indicates complete compliance with the ISO 19005-1 requirements, including those related to structural and semantic properties of documents.

member.name: F:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.PdfConformance.PdfA1A
member.summary: Part 1 of the PDF/A ISO standard [ISO 19005-1:2005] is a constrained form of Adobe PDF version 1.4 intended to be suitable for long-term preservation of page-oriented documents for which PDF is already being used in practice. Level B conformance (PDF-1b) indicates minimal compliance to ensure that the rendered visual appearance of a conforming file is preservable over the long term. Level A conformance (PDF-1a) indicates complete compliance with the ISO 19005-1 requirements, including those related to structural and semantic properties of documents.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Row
member.summary: Repserents a row in a .

example.code:
[C#] Pdf pdf1 = new Pdf(); Section sec1 = pdf1.Sections.Add(); Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table table1 = new Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table(); sec1.Paragraphs.Add(table1); table1.ColumnWidths = "70 2cm"; Row row1 = table1.Rows.Add(); Cell cell1Row1 = row1.Cells.Add("ColumnsSpan = 2"); cell1Row1.ColumnsSpan = 2; cell1Row1.Border = new BorderInfo((int)BorderSide.All,0.5F); Row row2 = table1.Rows.Add(); Cell cell1Row2 = row2.Cells.Add("cell1"); cell1Row2.Border = new BorderInfo((int)BorderSide.All,0.5F); Cell cell2Row2 = row2.Cells.Add("cell2"); cell2Row2.Border = new BorderInfo((int)BorderSide.All,0.5F,new Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Color("Red")); pdf1.Save(...); [Visual Basic] Dim pdf1 As Pdf = New Pdf() Dim sec1 As Section = pdf1.Sections.Add() Dim table1 As Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table = New Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table() sec1.Paragraphs.Add(table1) table1.ColumnWidths = "70 2cm" Dim row1 As Row = table1.Rows.Add() Dim cell1Row1 As Cell = row1.Cells.Add("ColumnsSpan = 2") cell1Row1.ColumnsSpan = 2 cell1Row1.Border = New BorderInfo(CType(BorderSide.All, Integer), 0.5) Dim row2 As Row = table1.Rows.Add() Dim cell1Row2 As Cell = row2.Cells.Add("cell1") cell1Row2.Border = New BorderInfo(CType(BorderSide.All, Integer), 0.5) Dim cell2Row2 As Cell = row2.Cells.Add("cell2") cell2Row2.Border = New BorderInfo(CType(BorderSide.All, Integer), 0.5, New Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Color("Red")) pdf1.Save(...) [XML]
ColumnsSpan = 2 cell1 cell2

member.summary: Gets or sets a object that indicates the default border style for all cells in this row.

member.summary: Gets or sets a object that indicates the default cell padding in the row.

member.summary: Gets or sets a object that indicates the vertical alignment type of all cells in this row.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Row.FixedRowHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets a float value that indicates the fixed row height. If the fixed row height is set, the property of IsBroken is disabled unless the real height of the row is out of the margin bound. When the value is too small, it will be enlarged automatically.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Row.IsDisabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether this row is disabled. The default value is false. If this property is set to true, this row will not be rendered.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Row.IsInNewPage
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether to split the table from this row and display the subsequent rows on the next page. The property doesn't support nested table.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Row.BackgroundColor
member.summary: Gets or sets a object that indicates the background color of the row.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Row.IsBroken
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the row can be broken or not when the row spans two pages. Default value is true.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Rows
member.summary: Represents a collection of objects.

example.code:
[C#] Pdf pdf1 = new Pdf(); Section sec1 = pdf1.Sections.Add(); Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table table1 = new Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table(); sec1.Paragraphs.Add(table1); table1.ColumnWidths = "70 2cm"; Row row1 = table1.Rows.Add(); Cell cell1Row1 = row1.Cells.Add("ColumnsSpan = 2"); cell1Row1.ColumnsSpan = 2; cell1Row1.Border = new BorderInfo((int)BorderSide.All,0.5F); Row row2 = table1.Rows.Add(); Cell cell1Row2 = row2.Cells.Add("cell1"); cell1Row2.Border = new BorderInfo((int)BorderSide.All,0.5F); Cell cell2Row2 = row2.Cells.Add("cell2"); cell2Row2.Border = new BorderInfo((int)BorderSide.All,0.5F,new Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Color("Red")); pdf1.Save(...); [Visual Basic] Dim pdf1 As Pdf = New Pdf() Dim sec1 As Section = pdf1.Sections.Add() Dim table1 As Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table = New Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table() sec1.Paragraphs.Add(table1) table1.ColumnWidths = "70 2cm" Dim row1 As Row = table1.Rows.Add() Dim cell1Row1 As Cell = row1.Cells.Add("ColumnsSpan = 2") cell1Row1.ColumnsSpan = 2 cell1Row1.Border = New BorderInfo(CType(BorderSide.All, Integer), 0.5) Dim row2 As Row = table1.Rows.Add() Dim cell1Row2 As Cell = row2.Cells.Add("cell1") cell1Row2.Border = New BorderInfo(CType(BorderSide.All, Integer), 0.5) Dim cell2Row2 As Cell = row2.Cells.Add("cell2") cell2Row2.Border = New BorderInfo(CType(BorderSide.All, Integer), 0.5, New Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Color("Red")) pdf1.Save(...) member.name: M:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Rows.AddRow(Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Section,Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Row)
member.summary: Adds a new object into pdf file, this method is used for direct-to-stream mode. When calling this method, the added row will be writen into pdf file directly. Direct-to-stream mode is very useful for processing large paragraphs. In this mode, however, you can't access the rows that added into the document any more, so some of the advanced features such as combination of XML and API, hyperlink to specified paragraph, total page number in footer,etc.,is not available.
member.param: The Section the table belongs to.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Security.Is128BitsEncrypted
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the Pdf documents will be 128 bits or 40 bits encrypted. Default is false, 40 bits encrypted.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Security.UserPassword
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that indicates the user password used in pdf encryption.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Security.MasterPassword
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that indicates the master password used in pdf encryption.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Security.IsPrintingAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether printing is allowed. Default is true.
member.remarks: To fully disable Pdf documents to be printable both and should be false.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Security.IsContentsModifyingAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether modifying contents is allowed. Default is true.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Security.IsCopyingAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether copying or otherwise extracting text and graphics from the document is allowed. Default is true.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Security.IsAnnotationsModifyingAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether adding or modifying text annotations is allowed. Default is true.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Security.IsFormFillingAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether filling in forms and signing the document is allowed. Default is true.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Security.IsScreenReadersAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether screen readers are allowed. Default is true.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Security.IsDocumentAssemblyingAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether assembling the document is allowed. This includes inserting, rotating, or deleting pages and creating navigation elements such as bookmarks or thumbnail images. Default is true.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Security.IsDegradedPrintingAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether printing in low resolution is allowed. Default is true.
member.remarks: To fully disable Pdf documents to be printable both and should be false.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Security.IsDefaultAllAllowed
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates if all permissions are set to allowed as default. Default value is true. If this property is set to false, then all permissions are set to NOT allowed.

member.name: T:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table
member.summary: Represents a table in a Pdf document.

example.code:
[C#] Pdf pdf1 = new Pdf(); Section sec1 = pdf1.Sections.Add(); Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table table1 = new Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table(); sec1.Paragraphs.Add(table1); table1.ColumnWidths = "70 2cm"; Row row1 = table1.Rows.Add(); Cell cell1Row1 = row1.Cells.Add("ColumnsSpan = 2"); cell1Row1.ColumnsSpan = 2; cell1Row1.Border = new BorderInfo((int)BorderSide.All,0.5F); Row row2 = table1.Rows.Add(); Cell cell1Row2 = row2.Cells.Add("cell1"); cell1Row2.Border = new BorderInfo((int)BorderSide.All,0.5F); Cell cell2Row2 = row2.Cells.Add("cell2"); cell2Row2.Border = new BorderInfo((int)BorderSide.All,0.5F,new Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Color("Red")); pdf1.Save(...); [Visual Basic] Dim pdf1 As Pdf = New Pdf() Dim sec1 As Section = pdf1.Sections.Add() Dim table1 As Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table = New Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table() sec1.Paragraphs.Add(table1) table1.ColumnWidths = "70 2cm" Dim row1 As Row = table1.Rows.Add() Dim cell1Row1 As Cell = row1.Cells.Add("ColumnsSpan = 2") cell1Row1.ColumnsSpan = 2 cell1Row1.Border = New BorderInfo(CType(BorderSide.All, Integer), 0.5) Dim row2 As Row = table1.Rows.Add() Dim cell1Row2 As Cell = row2.Cells.Add("cell1") cell1Row2.Border = New BorderInfo(CType(BorderSide.All, Integer), 0.5) Dim cell2Row2 As Cell = row2.Cells.Add("cell2") cell2Row2.Border = New BorderInfo(CType(BorderSide.All, Integer), 0.5, New Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Color("Red")) pdf1.Save(...) [XML]
ColumnsSpan = 2 cell1 cell2

member.name: M:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table.GetMinColumnWidth(Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the minimum column width at which no hyphenation needs for all cells in the column. Note that you can only use this method to get the minimum width for text paragraphs in the column. Other paragraph such as image will be ignored.
member.param: The object that indicates the PDF document.
The column number which begins at 0.
member.returns: The minimum with for the column.

example.code:
[C#] ... tab1.ImportArray(darr,0,0,true); tab1.SetColumnWidth(2,tab1.GetMinColumnWidth(pdf,2)); ...
[VisualBasic] tab1.ImportArray(darr,0,0,true) tab1.SetColumnWidth(2,tab1.GetMinColumnWidth(pdf,2))

member.name: M:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table.GetMaxColumnWidth(Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Pdf,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the maximum column width which allows text in all cells in the column be shown in one line. For example,if the text is "Thank you for considering Aspose", will return the width of "considering",and this method will return the width of "Thank you for considering Aspose". Note that you can only use this method to get the maximum width for text paragraphs in the column. Other paragraph such as image will be ignored.
member.param: The object that indicates the PDF document.
The column number which begins at 0.
member.returns: The maximum with for the column.

example.code:
[C#] ... tab1.ImportArray(darr,0,0,true); tab1.SetColumnWidth(2,tab1.GetMaxColumnWidth(pdf,2)); ...
[VisualBasic] tab1.ImportArray(darr,0,0,true) tab1.SetColumnWidth(2,tab1.GetMaxColumnWidth(pdf,2))

member.name: M:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table.SetColumnWidth(System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Sets the width of specidied column. This method is used to adjust column width after all cells have been added to table. Please see example of .
member.param: The column number which begins at 0.

member.name: M:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table.GetCell(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a cell according to it's row and column index. In the object model of table, rows and cells are represented by collections. When row span or column span is used, it is difficult to get cell from the collections according to it's row and column index. This method is used to get the cell when row span or column span is used.
member.param: If the table is changed after the last calling of this method on the same table.
member.returns: The cell at specified row and column.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table.IsFitToPage
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the table need to be placed on single page. Default value is false.The attribute is only valid when the table is the first paragraph on a page;

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table.IsNeedRepeating
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the paragraph need to be repeated on next page. Default value is false.The attribute is only valid when the paragraph itself and the object its ReferenceParagraphID referred to both are included in RepeatingRows.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table.ColumnWidths
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that contains the width of each columns in this table. The value of each column should be separated by blank.The default unit is point, but cm,inch and percentage of available width are also supported.For example,"120 2.5cm 1.5inch", or "60% 40%", The max column number is 1024,
member.remarks: If this property is set, the FitWidth property of the object needs not set.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table.IsRowBroken
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the row can be broken or not when its table is broken. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table.IsBroken
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the table is allowed to be broken or not when crossing pages.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table.IsVerticalBroken
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the table is broken vertically as the table is printed out of the right page margin.If The sub-table can be place in the same page,it will be placed after the original table in the same page. If The sub-table can't be place in the same page,it will be placed after the original table in the next page. The default value is false.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.Table.IsEmptyRowAtBottomShown
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates if the empty row at the bottom of the table be shown in the PDF. When a table is larger and can't be display in one page, the table will be splited into more tables. Sometimes the broken table has a empty row at the bottom. This property is used to control the displaying of the empty row. The default value is false.

member.summary: Clone a new object.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.FontName
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that indicates the text font name. Default is Times-Roman.
member.remarks: In Aspose.Pdf.Generator,three types of fonts is supported. The first type is base 14 font which are Courier,Courier-Bold,Courier-BoldOblique,Courier-Oblique,Helvetica,Helvetica-Bold,Helvetica-BoldOblique, Helvetica-Oblique,Symbol,Times-Bold,Times-BoldItalic,Times-Italic,Times-Roman and ZapfDingbats. Only font name are needed when using these fonts. The second type is postscript font. User should set the FontAfmFile or FontPfmFile,FontEncodingFile and FontOutlineFile if want to embed font. The last type is truetype font. User need to install the truetype font if it is not installed in the system. Truetype font with unicode is supported. TruetypeFontFileName should be set when unicode is used. We recommend that you use truetype font instead of postscript font becouse some type of postscript fonts are not supported.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.FontEncoding
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that indicates the font encoding name. For 8-bit fonts, encoding should be "builtin"(Original encoding used by non-text or non-Latin text fonts) , or "winansi"(Windows code page 1252), or the name of an external encoding("cp1251" for example). The default value is "winansi".

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.IsUnicode
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether unicode is used.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.IsFontEmbedded
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates if the font is embedded. Default is false.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.FontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets a float number that indicates the size of font. Unit is point. Default is 12.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.StrokeWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets a float number that indicates the width of the stroke.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.IsTrueTypeFontBold
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the TrueType font is bold.
member.remarks: Valid for TrueType fonts only.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.IsTrueTypeFontItalic
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the TrueType font is italic.
member.remarks: Valid for TrueType fonts only.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.FontAfmFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that indicates the name of custom AFM font file.
member.remarks: Valid for custom PostScript fonts only. You need to assign either or . If both are assigned will be evaluated first.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.FontPfmFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that indicates the name of custom PFM font file.
member.remarks: Valid for custom PostScript fonts only. You need to assign either or . If both are assigned will be evaluated first.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.FontOutlineFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that indicates the name of custom font outline file. This property is needed when embedding custom PostScript font into PDF files.

remarks.b: Valid for custom PostScript fonts only.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.FontEncodingFile
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that indicates the name of font encoding file. Font encoding files are available at http://www.unicode.org/Public/MAPPINGS/VENDORS/MICSFT/WINDOWS/ and http://www.unicode.org/Public/MAPPINGS/ISO8859/.The font encoding name is same as the encoding file name. For example, the encoding file is 'cp1250.txt' and the encoding name is 'cp1250';the encoding file is '8859-1.TXT' and the encoding name is '8859-1'.

remarks.b: Valid for custom PostScript fonts only.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.IsBaseline
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the text is baseline. Default is true.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.Alignment
member.summary: Gets or sets a that indicates the text alignment mode. This property should be set for the Text object but not Segment object.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.IsUnderline
member.summary: Gets or sets a bool value that indicates whether the text is with underline.

member.name: P:Aspose.Pdf.Generator.TextInfo.UnderlineOffset
member.summary: Gets or sets a float value that indicates the offset of the underline. Use positive value to move it up and negative to move down.
